body_content.explanation: the quality of being able to live or last for ever:
examples: Many Americans believe in some kind of immortality of the soul.
He sees cloning as the first step to achieving immortality.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being very special and famous and therefore likely to be remembered for a long time:
examples: The Wright brothers achieved immortality with the first powered flight in 1903.
"Video Killed the Radio Star" achieved pop immortality by being the first song ever played on MTV.
